Returns.Desc: A string (or stream) re-encoded in UTF-8 <u>string or stream</u>.

dec.Title: iconv.ascii.dec
dec.SummaryLine: Convert character encoding from ASCII to UTF-8.

data.Desc: The string or stream in ASCII encoding. <u>string or stream</u>.

dec.Desc: Convert the character encoding of the supplied data from ASCII to UTF-8.
